title: Charley Harper Little Sipper Hummingbird Mug
description:
Enjoy your early morning blend with Charley Harper’s animal artwork, discovering new details down to the last drop. Made of ceramic in the USA, it is a wonderful addition to your coffee cup collection. Holds 15 fluid ounces.

3 in. diam. x 4 ¾ x 5 ½ in.
